# Variables, expressions, and statements

## Basic Exmaple
This is a test code

### R code

```{r}
# This is an R code
x <- 1
```

### Python Code

The 'python' engine in knitr requires the `reticulate` package.

```{r load}
library(reticulate)
```

```{python}
# This is a Python code
x = 1
y = 3
print(x+y)
```
